name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Focused on delivering top-notch Manufacturing Execution Systems (MES) solutions, I am a seasoned Full Stack Developer with 8 years of experience in high-performance applications, particularly in the healthcare and financial sectors. My technical expertise includes proficiency in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, complemented by a robust development background in **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. I leverage deep cloud experience across **Azure** and **AWS** to create highly efficient systems.

My skills extend to a microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation, ensuring the applications I develop are secure, compliant with regulations such as FDA, GMP, and CSV, and cater to industry standards. Additionally, I have successfully integrated AI/ML capabilities into enterprise systems for predictive analytics and data processing, with hands-on experience in tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. I am committed to fostering collaboration and communication within teams to deliver optimal results.
